articles.title: iOS 14.4 beta 1 brings Handoff feature for HomePod Mini - Micky News
articles.description: Thanks to the U1 chip in HomePod Mini, it has now received the exciting Handoff feature! Latest iOS 14.4 beta 1 revealed it for the speaker.
articles.content:
According to 9to5Mac, the Handoff feature is now added to the HomePod Mini after the latest iOS 14.4 beta 1.
